segments.text: Excuse me , I am Dunlin . I am here about your advertisement for a tourist guide . Are there still any vacancies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm so lucky . I want to apply for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But do you have any experience like that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I have been a guide for two years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK.Then I want to ask you some questions about the tourist guide.If there wasn accident , for example a tourist falls ill , what would you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I will call the office to send someone to meet us , and escort that person to the nearest hospital without interrupting our trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If one of them forgot a camera in a restaurant , would you let the tourist bus go back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . In fact , prior to their boarding the bus and their getting off the bus , I will make an announcement to remind them that they should check their belongings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it seems that you have all the practical experience to handle these cases . I am very glad to welcome you into our company .
segments.speaker: S2
